Posts.Signature: Caregiver/my mom has pancreatic cancer stage 2 inoperable, Diagnosed January 2013(starting seeking help for pancreatitis April 2012) Did radiation/chemo pill, a tiny part in the center of the tumor still alive after treatment Tried chemo drip, after each round mom needed blood transfusion Mom is weak, doctor said she would not administer any more chemo September 2013 Mom is now stronger, no longer seeking treatment, coming home January2014 Mom living life July 28, 2014 Mom is at peace
Posts.Title: I am Part of the Zero Club
